analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam hetum dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo
analyzed: sampayuttam hetum dhammam paṭicca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na hetu dhammo
uppajjati hetu paccayā pe satta pañhā

original: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta pañhā.
analyzed: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam hetum dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā satta pañhā

original: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta pañhā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam hetum dhammam paṭicca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā satta pañhā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… vipāke cuddasa …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Sabbattha ekavīsa.)
analyzed: hetuyā ekavīsa pe vipāke cuddasa pe avigate ekavīsa sabbattha ekavīsa

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhamma

original: paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nanahetu ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na na hetu ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke cha pe avigate nava
